## Form.setDateConstraint() method

Set the date constraint ie exclude weekends and holidays from the datepicker

**Signature:**

```typescript
setDateConstraint(datecstr: DateConstraint, block: string, field: string | string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  datecstr | [DateConstraint](./forms42core.dateconstraint.md) | The date constraint to set. |
|  block | string | The block associated with the date constraint. |
|  field | string \| string\[\] | The field associated with the date constraint, or an array of fields. |

**Returns:**

void
